level.heading: Effect of leave on employment benefits or seniority.
level.text: An employee who takes leave pursuant to ยง 32-1202 shall not lose any employment benefit or seniority accrued before or during the date of such leave.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-146
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-146, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 32-1201.
